function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to virus due to handling of materials","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of disease","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and provide proper protective equipment","Technologies":"Use of UV-C disinfection, air purification systems, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Laboratory staff and researchers","Owner":"Institutional health and safety departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection leading to virus survival on surfaces","Impact":"Continued risk of transmission through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Use of effective disinfectants and regular disinfection protocols","Technologies":"UV-C germicidal lamps, ozone generators, and electrostatic sprayers","People":"Laboratory staff and researchers","Owner":"Institutional health and safety departments"},{"Description":"Contaminated equipment and tools as sources of transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infection through contact with contaminated items","Mitigation":"Strict cleaning and disinfection of equipment after each use","Technologies":"Autoclaves, steam sterilizers, and disinfectant wipes","People":"Laboratory staff and researchers","Owner":"Institutional health and safety departments"}]}
